name: Subsea Funs
description:
For a comfortable game, expand to full screen

---

Challenge yourself and complete the game at all levels of difficulty. This is extremely interesting!

---

Let's defenf our princess from fans!

Drag and drop bodyguards from house to house to build effective defence.

Use the cards and abilities.

Control of the game is made only with the mouse.
